author: caruta
body:
#### PR description:

This PR removes the "StringCutObjectSelector" from the Muon trigger DQM, with the aim of solving the [memory issues](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/40437#issuecomment-1640459028) faced during the 2022 rereco. 
The cuts on the reco muons and trigger objects are now applied explicitly, since they are few and [identical](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/40437#issuecomment-1640560259) for all trigger paths.
  - Most of the changes are in [HLTMuonMatchAndPlot.cc](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/compare/master...caruta:cmssw:master?expand=1#diff-def47c64859a25da5f880bada02a8b7995b19b6b65af9937e7a458e705304e3c) and in [HLTMuonMatchAndPlot.h](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/compare/master...caruta:cmssw:master?expand=1#diff-342e3f99c9ba8c51d285b842040b9ea69152eb41a6a54ba073e91913d81c0429) to implement the new way of applying cuts on the muon and trigger objects
  - The configuration files HLTMuonOfflineAnalyzer_cfi.py,  HLTMuonOfflineAnalyzer_cff.py and HLTMuonOfflineAnalyzer_cosmics_cff.py have also been modified accordingly.

This PR will be backported down to the 124X release (used for the 2022 rereco).

#### PR validation:

Tested running the DQM module on some of the [latest RelVal](https://cmsweb.cern.ch/das/request?instance=prod/global&input=file+dataset%3D%2FRelValZMM_14%2FCMSSW_13_2_0_pre2-131X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_v6_2023-v1%2FGEN-SIM-RECO), and checked the agreement of the distributions. Also ran `runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all --ibeos` and no failures were seen.

Changes in this PR have been already approved in [42348](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/42348)
title: Removal of StringCutObjectSelector from Muon trigger DQM
